question:
For each of the following statements, select "Yes" if the statement is true and "No" if the statement is false.
Automated machine learning is the process of automating the time-consuming, iterative tasks of machine learning model development. [00:43]
Automated machine learning can automatically infer the training data from the use case provided. [01:12]
Automated machine learning works by running multiple training iterations that are scored and ranked by the metrics you specify. [01:32]
Automated machine learning enables you to specify a dataset and will automatically understand which label to predict. [01:51]
For a machine learning progress, how should you split data for training and evaluation? [02:57]
options: Randomly split the data into rows for training and rows for evaluation.
Use labels for training and features for evaluation.
Use features for training and labels for evaluation.
Randomly split the data into columns for training and columns for evaluation.

question:
For each of the following statements, select "Yes" if the statement is true and "No" if the statement is false.
Forecasting housing prices based on historical data is an example of anomaly detection. [03:43]
Identifying suspicious sign-ins by looking for deviations from usual patterns is an example of anomaly detection. [03:58]
Predicting whether a patient will develop diabetes based on the patient's medical history is an example of anomaly detection. [04:10]

Complete the sentence by selecting the appropriate option from the drop-down list.
The handling of unusual or missing values provided to an AI system is a consideration for the Microsoft ______ principle of responsible AI. [04:39]

You are designing an AI system that empowers everyone, including people who have hearing, visual, and other impairments. This is an example of which Microsoft guiding principle for responsible AI? [05:59]
You are building an AI system. Which task should you include to ensure that the service meets the Microsoft transparency principle for responsible AI? [07:16]
options: Enable autoscaling to ensure that the service scales based on demand.
Ensure that all visuals have an associated text that can be read by a screen reader.
Ensure that the training dataset is representative of the population.
Provide documentation to help developers debug the code.

question:
Match the types of AI workloads to the appropriate scenarios. [08:32]
Workloads:
Anomaly detection
Machine learning regression
Natural language processing
Computer vision
Scenarios:
Identify a fraudulent credit card payment.
Predict next month's toy sales.
Predict the sentiment of a social media post.
Identify handwritten letters.

correctAnswers.scenario: Identify a fraudulent credit card payment.
Predict the sentiment of a social media post.

question:
Select the answer that correctly completes the sentence.
______ is used to extract dates, quantities, and locations from text. [10:35]
What are three Microsoft guiding principles for responsible AI? (Each correct answer presents a complete solution.) [11:05]
Returning a bounding box that indicates the location of a vehicle in an image is an example of... [11:38]
Which of the following is used to generate additional features? [12:41]

You own a charity event that involves posting photos of people wearing sunglasses on Twitter. You need to ensure that you only retweet photos that meet the following requirements: 1. Include one or more faces. 2. Contain at least one person wearing sunglasses. What should you use to analyze the images? [13:35]
options: The verify operation in the Face service.
The describe image operation in the Computer Vision service.
The detect operation in the Face service.
The analyze image operation in the Computer Vision service.

question:
For each of the following statements, select "Yes" if the statement is true and "No" if the statement is false.
Providing an explanation of the outcome of a credit loan application is an example of the Microsoft transparency principle for responsible AI. [14:46]
A triage bot that prioritizes insurance claims based on injuries is an example of the Microsoft reliability and safety principle for responsible AI. [15:08]
An AI solution that is offered at different prices for different sales territories is an example of the Microsoft inclusiveness principle for responsible AI. [15:19]

Match the principles of responsible AI to the appropriate requirements. [16:49]
Principles:
Fairness
Privacy and security
Transparency
Requirements:
The system must not discriminate based on gender or race.
Personal data must be visible only to approved users.
Automatic decision-making processes must be recorded so that approved users can identify why a decision was made.

correctAnswers.requirement: The system must not discriminate based on gender or race.
Personal data must be visible only to approved users.
Automatic decision-making processes must be recorded so that approved users can identify why a decision was made.

question: You plan to deploy an Azure Machine Learning model as a service that will be used by client applications. Which three processes should you perform in sequence before you deploy the model? [18:14]
You are building an AI-based app. You need to ensure that the app uses the principles for responsible AI. Which two principles should you follow? [19:27]
options: Implement a process of AI model validation as part of the software review process.
Prevent the disclosure of the use of AI-based algorithms for automated decision making.
Establish a risk governance committee that includes members of the legal team, members of the risk management team, and a privacy officer.
Implement an agile software development methodology.

question: According to Microsoft principles of responsible AI, which principle ensures that AI systems should not reflect biases from the datasets that are used to train the systems? [20:28]

Match the types of AI workloads to the appropriate scenarios. [21:13]
Workloads:
Natural language processing
Knowledge mining
Computer vision
Scenarios:
An automated chat bot to answer questions about refunds and exchanges.
Determining whether a photo contains a person.
Determining whether a review is positive or negative.

correctAnswers.scenario: An automated chat bot to answer questions about refunds and exchanges.
Determining whether a photo contains a person.
Determining whether a review is positive or negative.

question: Data values that influence the prediction of a model are called... [22:49]
Which type of machine learning should you use to predict the number of gift cards that will be sold next month? [23:53]

You have a dataset that contains information about taxi journeys that occurred during a given period. You need to train a model to predict the fare of a taxi journey. What should you use as a feature? [24:59]
options: The fare of individual taxi journeys.
The number of taxi journeys in the dataset.
The trip ID of individual taxi journeys.
The trip distance of individual taxi journeys.

question: You built a machine learning model by using the Automated machine learning user interface. You need to ensure that the model meets the Microsoft transparency principle for responsible AI. What should you do? [25:53]
options: Set max concurrent iterations to zero.

question: A banking system that predicts whether a loan will be repaid is an example of which type of machine learning? [27:04]
Which service should you use to extract text, key-value pairs, and table data automatically from scanned documents? [27:44]
You use Azure Machine Learning Designer to publish an inference pipeline. Which two parameters should you use to access the web service? [28:35]
From Azure Machine Learning Designer, to deploy a real-time inference pipeline as a service for others to consume, you must deploy the model to which of the following? [30:17]

For each of the following statements, select "Yes" if the statement is true and "No" if the statement is false.
Azure Machine Learning Designer provides a drag-and-drop visual canvas to build, test, and deploy machine learning models. [31:24]
Azure Machine Learning Designer enables you to save your progress as a pipeline draft. [31:40]
Azure Machine Learning Designer enables you to include custom JavaScript functions. [31:51]
Azure Machine Learning Designer lets you create machine learning models by... [32:27]
options: Adding and connecting modules on a visual canvas.
Automatically selecting an algorithm to build the most accurate model.
Automatically performing common data preparation tasks.

question:
For each of the following statements, select "Yes" if the statement is true and "No" if the statement is false.
Automated machine learning provides you with the ability to include custom Python scripts in a training pipeline. [33:20]
Automated machine learning implements machine learning solutions without the need for programming experience. [33:35]
Automated machine learning provides you with the ability to visually connect datasets and modules on an interactive canvas. [33:41]
When training a model, why should you randomly split the rows into separate subsets? [34:48]
options: To train the model twice to obtain better accuracy.
To test the model by using data that was not used to train the model.
To train multiple models simultaneously to attain better performance.

question: You are evaluating whether to use a Basic workspace or an Enterprise workspace in Azure Machine Learning. What are two tasks that require an Enterprise workspace? [35:48]
options: Use a graphical user interface to run Automated machine learning experiments.
Create a compute instance to use as a workstation.
Use a graphical user interface to define and run machine learning experiments from Azure Machine Learning Designer.
Create a dataset from a comma-separated value (CSV) file.

question: You need to predict the income range of a given customer using the following dataset (Name, Age, Educational Level, Income Range). Which two fields should you use as features to predict the income range? [37:25]

You are building a tool that will process images from retail stores and identify the products of competitors. The solution will use a custom model. Which Azure cognitive service should you use? [38:45]

For each of the following statements, select "Yes" if the statement is true and "No" if the statement is false.
Organizing documents into groups based on similarities of the text contained in documents is an example of clustering. [39:52]
Grouping similar patients based on symptoms and diagnostic test results is an example of clustering. [40:17]

For each of the following statements, select "Yes" if the statement is true and "No" if the statement is false.
Predicting whether a person will develop mild, moderate, or severe allergy symptoms based on pollen count is an example of clustering. [40:57]
A validation set includes the set of input examples that will be used to train a model. [41:14]

For each of the following statements, select "Yes" if the statement is true and "No" if the statement is false.
A validation set can be used to determine how well a model predicts labels. [42:22]
A validation set can be used to verify that all the training data was used to train the model. [42:31]
What are two metrics that you can use to evaluate a regression model? [43:10]

Complete the sentence.
Predicting the total number of customers who will visit a shopping mall on a specific day is an example of... [44:36]
You need to use Azure Machine Learning Designer to build a model that will predict automobile prices. Which type of modules should you use to complete the model? [49:40]
Which type of machine learning should you use to identify groups of people who have similar purchasing habits? [52:43]
Which model can be used to predict the sale price of auctioned items? [53:42]
Which metric can you use to evaluate a classification model? [54:18]
Which two components can you drag onto a canvas in Azure Machine Learning Designer? [55:00]
You need to create a training dataset and validation dataset from an existing dataset. Which module in the Azure Machine Learning Designer should you use? [55:30]

Match the types of machine learning to the appropriate scenarios. [56:12]
Types:
Regression
Clustering
Classification
Scenarios:
Predict how many minutes late a flight will arrive based on the amount of snowfall at an airport.
Segment customers into different groups to support a marketing department.
Predict whether a student will complete a university course.

correctAnswers.scenario: Predict how many minutes late a flight will arrive based on the amount of snowfall at an airport.
Segment customers into different groups to support a marketing department.
Predict whether a student will complete a university course.

question: Which of the following refers to the calculated probability of a correct image classification? [57:48]
Which API will be used to read information from an electricity bill? [58:20]
You are training and testing a K-Means clustering model with Azure ML. Your model should cluster items into three groups. Which K-Means clustering property should you set? [59:00]
options: Set the random number seed to three.
Set the number of centroids to three.

question: A translation feature and automatic language detection for multilingual search are features sought after by a commercial online store. Which Azure AI service should it rely on? [59:46]
What are the building blocks available in Azure ML Studio's drag-and-drop interface for authoring professional machine learning pipelines? [01:00:46]
